body: She hasn't lost it yet *sigh* this is truly a waste she should've fallen for a good guy not a fucking cuck
Hm. Not a fan of a scenario like that, at all.
Did they just keep her captive for 10 months with Yuu stopping by all the time? What a fucking stupid time jump.
Oh God this is so sad... What a waste, a fine woman like her fell for a pansy ass loser like him!
